["
Location:  Colorado Springs, CO
Description:  Our client is currently seeking a Data Scientist   
This candidate will perform analytics, create predictive models, and/or apply machine learning techniques for high-visibility projects, as a member of a collaborative and open team that prides themselves on innovative solutions. The data scientist will explore information from multiple sources in order to gain maximum insight and provide a competitive advantage. The “data science” tasks may include statistical analyses, knowledge discovery, data mining, machine learning, and predictive modeling.

Position Description

• Performs data studies of new and diverse data sources.
• Conducts statistical modeling and experiment design.
• Discovers “stories” told by the data and presents them to peers, software developers, business analysts and business managers.
• Creates and validates predictive models and advanced algorithms; trains AI and machine learning algorithms.

Knowledge, Skills and Abilities

• Strong knowledge of programming and pattern recognition.
• Possesses a mastery of statistics, machine learning, algorithms, predictive modeling, and advanced mathematics. Knowledge of deep learning techniques is desired.
• Strong critical thinking skills and the ability to relate them to Verizon business processes and operations.
• Use SQL (Structured Query Language) and other programming languages (R, C++, Python) for statistical computing, graphics, and data mining.
• Experience with RDBMS, columnar, and NoSQL database technologies
• Applicants should have experience with Big Data and related tools such as Hadoop or Spark
• Possesses strong exploratory analysis skills and ability to think and research creatively. Familiarity with tools such as R, Rstudio, Python scipy and numpy, Jupyter notebook is desired.
• Demonstrates excellent verbal and written communication skills as well as the ability to bridge the gap between data science and business management.
• Collaborate with business unit, IT, and data scientists across the enterprise to support descriptive and predictive analytics process.

Education and Experience

• Degree/experience:
o Master's Degree in one of: Physics (or other science), Engineering, or Mathematics (or statistics) plus 5-7 years analytics and data science experience, OR
o Ph.D. in one of: Physics (or other science), Engineering, or Mathematics (or statistics) plus 1-3 years of analytics and data science experience.

Contact: [ Link removed ] -  Click here to apply to Data Scientist
This job and many more are available through The Judge Group. Find us on the web at [ Link removed ] -  Click here to apply to Data Scientist

\xa0

Recommended skills
Data Science
Jupyter Notebook
Deep Learning
Data Mining
Predictive Modelling
Big Data

"]

['Front End Developer (Angular/ReactJS) w2 no C2C Job sits in CT/NY/NJ Leading Healthcare Company Pay is $DOE  Job Functions: You will develop full stack applications that are scalable, robust, and thoughtfully designed. You are comfortable with all layers of the stack, from the database to the front-end. You will be involved in the full software development lifecycle, from design to implementation. You will ship production code to a large customer base, and will take full ownership of your work, including testing and deployments. You will collaborate with other software engineers, domain experts, and end-users, to build the right solutions that address our business needs. You know how to navigate an organization to find the people and answers you need. You know how to make engineering trade-offs and how to communicate them to others. You can prioritize many competing tasks on an aggressive timeline. You are passionate about learning – about healthcare as well as technology. You are entrepreneurial, business-minded, and are willing to take risks and advocate new ideas \xa0 Skills: Required • 2+ years being part of Agile teams – Scrum or Kanban • 4+ years with object-oriented languages: ReactJS, NodeJS, C++, Python,\xa0 • 4+ years with scripting languages: Bash, SED, etc. • 4+ years in AWS Web development and backend web service frameworks: S3, Django, ClaudiaJS , Express • Claudia, Lambda, API Gateway, Terraform, GraphQL/HTTP REST, Cloudwatch, Terraform\xa0 • Knowledge of CRUD Operations in Relational Databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Aurora, etc.), and Non-relational databases database (Dynamo, Mongo, etc.)\xa0 • Experience with Git/SVN • Automated CI/CD experience (Jenkins, Veracode, SonarQube, Jest, Enzyme, ESLint, Postman, etc.) and a TDD mindset • Cloud infrastructure experience (AWS or other) • Excellent troubleshooting skills, drive, and ambition \xa0 Nice to Have • Prior healthcare experience • ETL and working with large data sets in AWS S3 glue/parquet/aethena/redshift environments\xa0', '', '*d1-ks']

["
ETL Developer
Atlanta, GA

What you'll do
UST Global® is looking for a senior ETL developer (Informatica/Python/); to work with one of the leading healthcare providers in the US. The ideal candidate must have hands on expertise with multiple ETL technologies and possess a strong understanding of healthcare domain. The candidate must possess excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability and know how to collaborate effectively with domain experts and senior leadership

Responsibilities:

• Analyses highly complex business requirements; designs and writes technical specifications to design or redesign complex requirements
• Develop complex requirements
• Provides coding direction to less experienced staff or develops highly complex original code.
• Acts as an expert technical resource for modelling; simulation and analysis efforts.
• Candidate must be able to work under minimal supervision; must be a self-starter and lead aspects of project work as needed
• Candidate must interact with stakeholders; users for requirement clarification; design and development of ETL Process.

Requirements:
• 8+ years of overall IT experience working on ETL related technologies
• 7 + years of informatica
• Should have Python programming experience
• 2+ Years experience in Spark
• 5+ year's experience in any flavor of SQL dealing with complex queries
• 5+ Years of experience working with healthcare data. (Payer data)
• 5 + Years expertise working with Oracle DB./ Exadata
• Expertise in MDM is preferred
• Expertise handling complex business rule transformation is prefered
• Understanding of all new cutting-edge technology in ETL area
• Knowledge about data structures and data architecture


Location
Preferred location is Atlanta followed by any other locations with an Anthem office including but not limited to Richmond VA; Atlanta GA; Norfolk VA; Mason; OH; Woodland Hills CA; Thousand Oaks CA. Work from home options anywhere in US might also be considered in certain cases though not preferred.
What you bring


While others say it, we do it: we care.\xa0 We have great people and we do great work.\xa0 Just as importantly, we have great relationships with an impressive clientele. Over 1,000 talented, diverse, and career-minded professionals are carving out their role and experiencing a good mix of challenges and opportunities – and we're rooting for them along the way, every day. The ETL is built on Python framework.• Need to support the ETL process and work on any failures in its daily schedule.• CICD (Jenkins and Udeploy) - automated deployment process is used for pushing any changes in code.• The usage data reports/dashboards are available in ARC

Our client is looking for a Front End Developer who can develop effective user interfaces on the company website and mobile apps released to the public and Windows applications for internal or our customers' use. The successful candidate will work closely with other software developers to design or update the front end of our various applications and make them more efficient and maintain consistency across them. The front end developer will also be responsible for creating innovative solutions to front end issues to help make our applications more visually appealing and enhance usability.Front End Developer Responsibilities:* Determine the structure and design of our front end applications on various devices including mobile devices.* Design a framework for creating user apps that grows with the needs of the company* Utilize a variety of markup languages to write web pages and mobile app pages.* Implement responsible web design principles to ensure that our company website renders well across multiple devices* Develop features to enhance the user experience.* Monitor website performance, watch for site usability problems and rectify the issues* Build reusable code for future use and shared among the front end applications.* Optimize web pages and mobile pages for maximum speed and scalability.*Maintain brand consistency throughout design.*Assist in the development of applications and features that will be put on the website and in internal functions as wellFront End Developer Requirements:*3+ years' hands-on web development experience required. *2+ years' hands-on mobile app development experience required. *2+ years' hands-on Windows application development experience required. *Strong experience in Visual Studio and source version control.*Strong experience in one or more of the programming languages: C#, Java, AngularJS, NodeJS, Python, PHP, etc., preferably C#.*Strong experience in OOP. *Strong experience in most of these technologies: MVC, MVVM, Xamarin, WinForm, WPF, etc. *Proficiency with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and bootstrap; Understanding of server-side CSS.*Experience with graphic design applications such as Adobe Illustrator.*Experience with responsive and adaptive design.*Keen on putting ideas into programming codes. *Good problem solving skills.*Excellent verbal communication skills.*Good interpersonal skills.Most importantly, we are seeking a Programmer with 2 years mobile app development experience who knows C# with strong experience in Visual Studio, MVC, MVVM Xamarin WinForm, WPF. ***All Qualified Candidates, please contact: Balin Morrison ***Email: [ Email address blocked ] -  Click here to apply to Front End Developer

column4:
['
Diversant is looking for a Sr. Hadoop Developer for a contract to hire opportunity in Newark, DE  Responsibilities: • Lead projects end-to-end. Meet with business users to determine requirements, analyze the data lake for relevant datasets, collaborate with other developers to design a technical solution, and see the project through to completion. • Design and build analytical workflows that take data from the lake and transforms, filters, aggregates, and computes a meaningful result or report for use by a consumer application • Develop highly scalable and extensible Big Data platform, which enables collection, storage, modeling, and analysis of massive data sets from numerous channels • Continuously evaluate new technologies, innovate and deliver solution for business critical applications  Requirements: • Bachelor’s / Master’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent • Minimum 8 years of Software Development experience • Minimum 5 years of experience with the Hadoop/Cloudera ecosystem, such as Spark, MapReduce, Yarn, Hive, Sqoop, Impala, Kafka and Oozie • Experience with Apache Spark • Experience with Unix / Linux and shell scripting • Experience with two or more Programming Languages (SQL, Java , Python, Scala, R) • Experience leading software projects, from the design through release phases • Experience using the Data lake to design and produce analytical output through batch and real-time processing • Strong understanding of capacity planning, software development lifecycle, and enterprise production deployments • Hands-on experience benchmarking systems, analyzing bottlenecks, and designing performant code  Preferred Skills: • SDLC Methodology - Agile / Scrum / Iterative Development • Job Scheduling Tools (Autosys) • Version Control System (Git, Bitbucket) • Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) pipelines (Jenkins) • Real Time Streaming (Kafka) • Visual Analytics Tools (Tableau) • No SQL Technologies (Hbase) • Data Integration, Data Security on Hadoop ecosystem. ( Kerberos ) • Awareness or experience with Data Lake with Cloudera ecosystem 
\xa0

Recommended skills
Apache Spark
Apache Yarn
Apache Hive
Big Data
Apache H Base
Map Reduce

']

column4:
["
Fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. Our open digital payments platform gives PayPal’s 305 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. Through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, PayPal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. Available in more than 200 markets around the world, the PayPal platform, including Braintree, Venmo and Xoom enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their PayPal accounts in 25 currencies.The Model Controls Analyst role will be responsible for managing all the ongoing monitoring and maintenance activities for models used across the credit lifecycle in the Global Credit Risk business within PayPal. These activities are governed by the enterprise wide Model Risk Management standards and procedures. These include generating model performance reports on a regular basis, driving insights from the results and making recommendations on continued use of models to all stakeholders.
Independently manage ongoing monitoring activities for all models spanning across the credit lifecycle used in Global Credit Risk business per the enterprise wide Model Risk Management standards
Generate model monitoring reports on an ongoing basis consisting of statistical measures of model performance, model stability and model accuracy that utilize advanced modeling techniques such as Linear/Logistic Regressions as well as Machine Learning algorithms
Conduct advanced statistical analyses to understand historical performance trends and generating insights by performing deep dives into evaluating root causes of changes in performance or threshold breaches if any
Establish metrics for tracking model performance relevant to business needs apart from the prescribed statistical measures
Interfaces with all levels of management to present and communicate model monitoring results including model developers, model owners / users, partner banks, model oversight teams in the second line Model Risk Management function as well as senior management in various forums
Explore and develop state of the art computer programs leveraging multiple programming languages to automate and enhance the monitoring reports and activities
Work closely with second line teams on adoption of model governance standards and policies
Ensure all models are accurately inventoried and properly documented
Participate in the formal model governance process to ensure models are reviewed and approved by all key stakeholders
Qualifications: 
Bachelor’s / Master’s degree in quantitative area strongly preferred – including mathematics, statistics, engineering, computer science, economics or finance
3+ years’ experience in model development or model validation / model risk management in consumer and/or business financing credit risk
Strong programming skills necessary with preferred background in SAS and SQL, however extensive experience in other languages such as Python or R would be acceptable
Strong written, oral, and interpersonal skills
Experience working with large datasets is a plus
We're a purpose-driven company whose beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We hold ourselves to our One Team Behaviors which demand that we hold the highest ethical standards, to empower an open and diverse workplace, and strive to treat everyone who is touched by our business with dignity and respect. Our employees challenge the status quo, ask questions, and find solutions. We want to break down barriers to financial empowerment. Join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedom.PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at [ Email address blocked ] -  Click here to apply to Senior Model Controls Analyst.R0056411
\xa0

Recommended skills
Economics
Computer Sciences
Metrics
Monitoring Results
Mathematics
Risk Management

"]

column1: Systems Engineer for Hawaii TDY Assignment
column4: ['Intelligence', 'The Intelligence group provides high-end systems engineering and integration products and services, data analytics and software development to national and military intelligence customers. Serving federal agencies and the Intelligence Community for more than 50 years, the Intelligence group helps our clients meet their mission needs by providing trusted advisors, leading-edge technologies, and innovative solutions.', 'This Systems Engineer will provide “Dashboard” data analytics using database information from multiple sources.\xa0 Solutions are prototyped for the local customer, but are general enough to be adapted to enterprise level as needed. The person will be working within the customer’s Hawaii Systems Engineering team for Data Analytics, ensuring integration activities comply with enterprise architecture objectives and user requirements. This task will be supported with TDY entitlements. ', '', '', '', 'Individual Capabilities/Experience Required:', '\xa0', 'Individual Capabilities/Experience Desired:', 'What matters to our nation, is what matters to us. At Perspecta, everything we do, from conducting innovative research to cultivating strong relationships, supports one imperative: ensuring that your work succeeds.\xa0 Our company was formed to bring a broad array of capabilities to all parts of the public sector—from investigative services and IT strategy to systems work and next-generation engineering.\xa0Our promise is simple: never stop solving our nation’s most complex challenges. And with a workforce of approximately 14,000, more than 48 percent of which is cleared, we have been trusted to do just that, as a partner of choice across the entire sector.\xa0Perspecta is an\xa0[ Link removed ] -  Click here to apply to Systems Engineer for Hawaii TDY Assignment\xa0Employer - Minorities/Women/Veterans/Disabled and other protected categories.', '', 'As a government contractor, Perspecta abides by the following provision', '', 'Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination Provision', '', 'The contractor will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant.\xa0 However, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of the other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the contractor’s legal duty to furnish information. 41 CFR 60-1.35(c).']
column5: ['J Query', 'Software Design', 'Cascading Style Sheets (Css)', 'Asp.Net Mvc Framework', 'Java Script (Programming Language)', 'Requirements Elicitation']

column4:
['
WORK FROM HOMEThis Jobot Job is hosted by: Luke SwiftAre you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply on company site" button and sending us your resume.Salary: $100,000 - $135,000A bit about us:Our powerful SaaS platform connects customers to real estate agents and help them save money in the process (sellers get a discount on commission, buyers get a rebate on their home purchase).We are now seeking several REMOTE Software Engineers (Mid/Senior level) with a background developing customer-facing SaaS and web-based applications experience, primarily with Python and Django. In this role, you'll do a lot of paired-programming with several members of our team the first few months in order to familiarize you with our existing systems and to build relationships with the rest of the Engineering team. You either should enjoy it or at least be willing to do paired-programming, otherwise this isn't the right opportunity for you. They should be well-versed with server-side technologies such as RESTful APIs, Amazon Web Services, CI/CD tools, and databases (PostgreSQL/NoSQL). Any experience with JavaScript and React.js is highly desired, but not required as we will ramp you up on them and any of the other technologies we use in no time. Lastly, this is a great time to get in on ground floor working alongside the Founders, CTO, and a key hire in shaping the way the organization's future goes. If this sounds like you, please apply now!Why join us?
 Marquee Product!
 Flexible Work Schedules!
 Accelerated Career Growth!
Job DetailsDay to Day:
 Develop, maintain, and enhance our powerful SaaS platform
 Take ownership by creating your own technical specs because as a small team, you are given personal ownership of the planning processes.
 Collaborate a lot with each other and with product stakeholders. 
 Participate in the spec processes for new features and epics on our roadmap, and you'll help others resolve issues when they have questions about certain parts of the codebase that you've gained familiarity with. 
 Establish strong working relationships with individuals inside and outside of Engineering, and you'll have a clear understanding of both our customer journey and the workflows of our internal stakeholders.
 Tackle small bugs and features while performing root-cause analysis for bugs independently, escalating to other teammates when you need a second set of eyes. 
 Use the business context you've picked up to discuss the priority of features and bugs in the backlog. 
 Advocate a new trend or tool that will help us perform root-cause analysis more easily when issues come up.
Requirements:
 4+ years of Software Development experience
 2+ years of experience working on a consumer-facing SaaS or web-based application products
 Experience and/or willingness to participate in paired-programming (No Exceptions)
 Advanced with Python programming 
 Experience with Django or similar python web framework (Flask)
 Experience with RESTful API design & development
 Experience with RDBMs (PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases
 Experience working within an Amazon Web Services (AWS) environment
 Familiar with CI/CD and DevOps tools and best practices is highly desired
Nice to have skills: 
 Proficient with web technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS
 Experience with ReactJS is highly desired
Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply on company site" button.
\xa0

Recommended skills
No Sql
Amazon Web Services
Java Script (Programming Language)
Api Design
Cascading Style Sheets (Css)
Hyper Text Markup Language (Html)

']

["






How You Can Make an ImpactAs a Senior Strategy Developer on one of our growing high-frequency trading teams, you will partner directly with a group of Traders and a Senior Developer to advance a platform that optimizes current and new algorithmic trading strategies in global markets. This person will work alongside a group of talented and passionate individuals in designing, implementing, and owning solutions to exciting problems. The ideal candidate is looking to have a significant impact on a hands-on, performance-driven team and will be appropriately compensated for their effort. 

Manage the current strategy model and partner with another talented development mind to build out new alpha-generating strategies and trading tools ]
Communicate with Traders daily to maintain trading production across global markets
Identify possible enhancements, design solutions and implement new trading applications in a clean, concise way that continues to decrease latency for greater execution edge

What You'll Need

BS or MS in Computer Science or STEM-related field of study preferred
At least 5+ years of low-level C++ programming experience including C++ 11/14/17 required
Prior experience with distributed systems and multi-threaded application design and development required
Linux/Unix experience required
Prior scripting experience with Python highly preferred
Experience with kdb+ or another time-series database highly preferred
Prior experience in a proprietary trading or financial services environment highly preferred

Who We AreGeneva Trading LLC is a global principal trading firm founded in 1999 with offices in Chicago, Dublin, and Singapore. Our dedication to the improvement and optimization of our best-in-class proprietary technology allows our firm to compete on all levels in the global trading industry. We pride ourselves on a collaborative culture of integrity, trust, passion, and dedication to personal excellence. Our flat organizational structure and casual environment attracts individuals with the drive to innovate and has led to our consistent success.We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.






PM20 PI123189725
\xa0

Recommended skills

Global Marketing
Trading
Financial Services
Databases
Success Driven

"]

column4:
["One North is a full-service digital agency helping businesses solve complex problems in creative ways. We're makers, technologists and relationship builders guiding you toward what's next. Unlike traditional agencies, we stitch together a deep level of expertise across disciplines so that we can do the work of multiple teams. With capabilities in brand and communications, digital experience, technology and infrastructure, and optimization and insights, we can take on any challenge. We deliver the human element to digital so that your big ideas come to life. One North is a TEKsystems company.We are a fast-paced organization with a dynamic and diverse work environment. Our values guide our hiring decisions and shape how we make a meaningful impact for our clients.PRIMARY OBJECTIVEEnjoy building great things with great people? We're looking for enthusiastic Full Stack .NET Developers with Sitecore experience to join our tech team in problem solving, building, designing and architecting advanced technical solutions for our clients. Apply emerging tools and technologies, and grow your career, with an organization interested in seeing what you can do.One North is structured in an open office environment with room to collaborate across a number of different teams and functions. Overlooking the Chicago River, our office is located in the Loop. However, we are open to Sitecore practitioners working remotely in key markets.RESPONSIBILITIESPlease bring:

• A love for the culture, process and craft of web development - we enjoy sharing what we learn with each other and the open source community at large.

• A true empathy for the client experience, appreciating what it takes to form long-term, deep client relationships. These are large-scale projects for high-profile clients, allowing you to take a consulting approach to your development.

• The ability to engineer for performance, maintainability and efficiency, while also creating beautiful end-user experiences.This is a team sport:

• Work with architects, account managers, other developers and our clients to deliver full-featured, data-driven websites, utilizing the latest technologies, frameworks and tools.

• Coordinate and participate in the implementation, testing and support of web-based projects using MVC, Node, Vue, React, MongoDB, .NET/C# , ASP.NET, JavaScript/JQuery, CSS, SQL Server, GIT and Visual Studio.Blow us away with your brain powers:

• Leverage industry-leading content management systems (including Sitecore) to focus on delivering new and creative solutions to clients.

• Utilize your deep knowledge of the .NET page lifecycle/MVC, of object oriented programming concepts, browser compatibility considerations and web performance optimization tools.

• Note: Alternative, but relative, experience [Java, php experience, Python] is not a deal-breaker - as long as you've got that solid background in tech with transferrable skills, a penchant for learning quickly and a passion for solving problems.Your weapons (wield them wisely):

• Expert in .NET MVC, ASP.NET

• Extensive use of modern CMS systems (Sitecore required)

• Experience with HTML5, CSS3 (Sass)

• Experience with JavaScript, Vue, React

• Broad knowledge of capabilities across different browsers, devices

• Multiple Javascript frameworks, and when to use (or not use) each one

• A desire to work in a place where creativity (and humor) is consistently appreciatedAdditional skills & qualifications:

• Passion for technology: Our developers must demonstrate a passion for technology and a hunger to grow and continue learning in their field (coding outside of work, self-education, involvement in local tech community, etc.).

• Collaborative spirit: We work with team members across functions, so they must be comfortable with a highly collaborative environment.

• Strong communication skills: Our developers must have a desire to collaborate across multiple creative, strategic, and technical resources including UX, Creative Design, Brand, Digital Strategy, and Web Development.*** Open to remote work in key markets such as Dallas, New York City, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Washington D.C., Seattle, Boston, Miami, Austin (TX), Atlanta, Charlotte, Denver, Minneapolis, Detroit, Raleigh-Durham, Columbus (OH), Cincinnati, Philadelphia, and Indianapolis ***", '', '', '', 'About TEKsystems:', "We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company."]

column4: ['\r\nApplication Developer, Indianapolis, INIncreasing the number of emergency departments (EDs) and urgent care centers (UCCs) submitting their data to CDC (through a process referred to as “onboarding”),Coordinating quality improvement efforts for this data,Reporting data for COVID-like illness (CLI) and other syndromes/illnesses to CDC.Perform ADT/ED/UCC data quality monitoring and analysis,Coordinate ED/UCC onboarding efforts,Design/test/validate/refine syndrome definitions for CLI and other illnesses,Report trends of interest internally/publicly and to CDC,Monitor and leverage the data arriving in the biosense Platform,Collaborate with CDC on topics of national public health concern, andDisseminate lessons learned as well as any developed novel analytic tools/scripts.Fulfilling these responsibilities in timely manner will at a minimum require substantial experience in data analysis with Python/pandas or R/tidyverse. Basic data analytics tasks that the position will employ routinely include importing/exporting datasets, connecting to and querying databases, linking across datasets, subsetting, transforming columns and rows, and deriving aggregation statistics. SQL will be used frequently in retrieving information from databases. Ideally, this position will venture into novel applications of statistical inference/modeling and machine learning techniques to syndrome data.The role will involve collaboration with multiple local stakeholders such as the client Health Information Exchange, Hospital Association and state agencies central to the response effort.The position will be supervised by the Syndrome Data Lead and the Director of Public Health Informatics.The Company is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE) and offers any job opportunity to any qualified candidate without regard to age, race, gender, national origin, physical appearance, sexual orientation, etc.\n']

column4:
["
Ready to make an impact?\xa0 If so, read on!Would you like to be a part of the team that brings data innovation, Machine Learning and AI enabling to GEICO? We are looking for a highly motivated Data Systems Analyst to support the Data Science Development lifecycle process and help solve complex business problems using predictive analytics/modeling approaches.Job Responsibilities:\xa0As a Data Systems Analyst, you will work with Machine Learning Developers, Data Modelers, and the business to:•Conduct requirement and systems analysis, translating business requirements and performance metrics into modeling requirements and metrics•Clearly define and document business problems by conferring with clients; evaluating procedures and processes, and assessing existing metrics•Facilitate solution-design sessions with Machine Learning Developers, Data Scientists and business stakeholders•Coordinate with the Machine Learning Developers and Data Scientists to document analytics solutions, approaches and results•Communicate and coordinate effectively with clients and other stakeholders•Support systems design, testing and deployment of predictive models into production•Conduct data / metric analysis, assess impact of a new solution on key metrics, and analyze potential value•Monitor performance of deployed models and develop recommendations on model refresh•Set up metrics plans, conduct analysis of results, and report findings•Capture data from Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW) and Hadoop using SQL•Create and execute test plans to test model services•Assist with agile process and project planningWould you like to join our innovative team?\xa0 If so, do you meet these qualifications?Required Qualifications:\xa0• A minimum of three years of progressive analysis/systems experience in large scale IT projects• Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Computer Sciences, Information Technology, Engineering, Management of Information Systems, or equivalent work experience• Ability to support multiple projects simultaneously and work in a dynamic environment• Experience working in an Agile team and familiarity with Agile project management practices• Experience documenting business processes, requirements, and application test plans• Working knowledge of SQL• Experience conducting metrics analysis and reporting• Strong critical thinking, decision-making and problem-solving skillsDesired Qualifications:\xa0• Demonstrated experience with SQL scripting language• Experience with process improvement• Foundational understanding of Statistics and analysis of A/B tests• Experience in R or Python programming language#LI-AM1#DI-AM
 About GEICO
 For more than 75 years, GEICO has stood out from the rest of the insurance industry! We are one of the nation's largest and fastest-growing auto insurers thanks to our low rates, outstanding service and clever marketing. We're an industry leader employing thousands of dedicated and hard-working associates. As a wholly owned subsidiary of Berkshire Hathaway, we offer associates training and career advancement in a financially stable and rewarding workplace.
 Our associates' quality of life is important to us. Full-time GEICO associates are offered a comprehensive Total Rewards Program*, including:
   401(k) and profit-sharing plans Medical, dental, vision and life insurance Paid vacation, holidays and leave programs Tuition reimbursement  Associate assistance program  Flexible spending accounts  Business casual dress Fitness and dining facilities (at most locations) Associate clubs and sports teams Volunteer opportunities  GEICO Federal Credit Union 


 * Benefit offerings for positions other than full-time may vary. 
 GEICO is an equal opportunity employer. GEICO conducts drug screens and background checks on applicants who accept employment offers.
 How to Apply Click 'Apply for Job' to complete your application. You will need an active email address and phone number. Please upload your resume, preferably as Word .doc files or PDF. Once you begin your application you can save it and access it later. Your application should include any work and/or internship experience from at least the past five years.

 

Recommended skills
Data Science
Decision Making
Systems Design
Systems Analysis
Complex Problem Solving
Project Planning

"]

column1: Data Developer / C# Data Engineer (Direct Hire Perm)
column4:
["
Ref ID: 01500-0011555882Classification: Database DeveloperCompensation: $80000.00 to $110000.00 yearlyData Developer / C# Data Engineer (Direct Hire Perm)Cutting edge Opportunity! Interested in learning new tools and emerging technologies around programming and Big Data? Our client offers a fast-paced and challenging environment where your ideas will be highly valued and implemented and you can quickly learn new toolsets!What You Will Be Doing:We are in search of an experienced Data Developer / C# Data Engineer with proven experience in SQL, SSIS, BUT the cool part is that you won’t be writing new SSIS packages, you will be working with cutting edge tools in Big Data that you will get trained on. In this Data Developer / C# Data Engineer position, you will work with complex databases, very complex data, in a fast-paced environment! Looking for an understanding of software development and automation, where you will be driving engineering software solutions. Experienced in C#, SQL, data streaming, and the ability to write code in .NET or Java or Python. You will be providing data with real-time, event-driven data streams mission critical for the business!This Data Developer / C# Data Engineer is a permanent position with one of our local client companies. For immediate and confidential consideration on this Permanent / Direct hire IT opportunity, please call me directly, Carrie Danger, Division Director, Technology Permanent Placement Division, Iowa Region at 515-282-6876.What You Will Need:Join a Data Management team where you will be data streaming in real-time, working with Big Data tools! You will be working with real time event driven data streams with cutting edge tools, and streaming analytics. Do C# Development, console application development and Data analysis and a deep understanding of SQL.Full time direct hire position up to 95K. For immediate and confidential consideration on this Direct Hire position or other permanent IT opportunities in the Des Moines or the Iowa area, please call Carrie Danger, Division Director at 515-282-6876. Your resume will not be submitted to any client companies without your direct permission OR just inquire for More Information!!
REQUIREMENTS: * Experience working within SQL, SSIS. * Experience software development in C# and automation is preferred - .Net, Python, or Java. * Ability to pick up on cutting edge tools quickly. * Ability to communicate with Senior management and throughout the organization! * PERM * No Third Parties or C2C!Robert Half Technology matches IT professionals with some of the best companies on a temporary, project or full-time basis. From roles in software and applications to IT infrastructure and operations, we provide you unparalleled access to exciting career opportunities. Our personalized approach, innovative matching technology and global network with local market expertise help you find the technology jobs that match your skills and priorities — fast. By working with us, you have access to challenging opportunities, competitive compensation and benefits, and training to enhance your skill sets. From philanthropy to environmental stewardship to employee programs, Robert Half is proud to have an active role in the communities in which we live and work. Our company has appeared on FORTUNE’s “Most Admired Companies” list every year since 1998. Download our mobile app to take your job search on the go! Contact your local Robert Half Technology office at 888.490.4429 or visit www.roberthalf.com/jobs/technology to apply for this job now or find out more about other job opportunities. All applicants applying for U.S. job openings must be authorized to work in the United States. All applicants applying for Canadian job openings must be authorized to work in Canada. © 2020 Robert Half Technology. An Equal Opportunity Employer M/F/Disability/Veterans. By clicking 'Apply Now' you are agreeing to Robert Half [ Link removed ] -  Click here to apply to Data Developer / C# Data Engineer (Direct Hire Perm).

Recommended skills

column4: ["Important Note: During the application process, ensure your contact information (email and phone number) is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration. To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation. The invitation can be sent by both email and text message.\xa0 In order to receive text message invitations, your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as 'Personal Cell' or 'Cellular' in the contact information of your application.", "At Wells Fargo, we want to satisfy our customers' financial needs and help them succeed financially. We're looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do. Join our diverse and inclusive team where you'll feel valued and inspired to contribute your unique skills and experience.", 'Help us build a better Wells Fargo. It all begins with outstanding talent. It all begins with you.', 'Corporate Risk helps all Wells Fargo businesses identify and manage risk. The team focuses on several key risk types, including conduct, credit, financial crimes, information security, interest rate, liquidity, market, model, operational, regulatory compliance, reputation, strategic, and technology risk. The group provides leadership, enhances communications, assists with problem identification and solutions, and shares best practices. In addition, the group provides an enterprise-wide view of risk, assists management and our Board of Directors in identifying and monitoring risks that may affect multiple lines of business, and takes appropriate action when business activities exceed the risk tolerance of the company.', "Corporate Model Risk:\xa0 Wells Fargo's Corporate Model Risk is responsible for independently overseeing the management of model risk exposures across the enterprise (including governing, monitoring, and reporting on aggregate model risk exposures, model validations, and model oversight across enterprise). This oversight extends to all phases of a model's life cycle, including identification, development, validation, implementation, finding resolution, usage, performance monitoring, documentation, and retirement.", "Qualitative Model Validation:\xa0 The Qualitative Model Validation group is responsible for validating and approving all qualitative models used across Wells Fargo including Credit, Liquidity, Market, Operational, Pre-Provision Net Revenue (PPNR), Finance, Balance Sheet, and Financial Crimes to name a few. The team's responsibilities include performing model validations (independent reviews, writing validation reports, and approving model usage), annual reviews, performance monitoring, and issue management. The team works closely with model users, developers, model governance, and Corporate Functional Model Oversight (CFMO) teams to manage model risk to the firm and facilitate the model approval process.", 'The Role: The Qualitative Model Validator will be responsible for the quality and completion of model validation to support business activities across several areas. This role will cover models in the following areas, among others: securities valuation, investment and portfolio management, market & counterparty risk, stress testing, and financial planning & analysis.', 'Specifically this individual will have responsibility to:', 'The Candidate: This validator will have substantial experience in his/her area of specialty to facilitate credible challenge of the processes/models and to develop the skills of the junior validation team.', '', '', 'AZ-PHX-Central Phoenix: 100 W Washington St - Phoenix, AZIA-West Des Moines: 7001 Westown Pkwy - West Des Moines, IANY-New York: 150 E 42nd St - New York, NYMN-Minneapolis: 600 S 4th St - Minneapolis, MNTX-DAL-Downtown Dallas: 1445 Ross Ave - Dallas, TXNC-Charlotte: 301 S Tryon St - Charlotte, NCMO-Saint Louis: 1 N Jefferson Ave - Saint Louis, MO', 'All offers for employment with Wells Fargo are contingent upon the candidate having successfully completed a criminal background check. Wells Fargo will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable local, state and Federal law, including Section 19 of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act.Relevant military experience is considered for veterans and transitioning service men and women.Wells Fargo is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer, Minority/Female/Disabled/Veteran/Gender Identity/Sexual Orientation.']

You will be working with talented team members to architect, develop and maintain Excel, Access database, Microsoft Project Server based solutions to support Engineering, Finance/Contracts and Operations, learn and apply cutting edge industry standard tools and processes.Job Responsibilities:-Experience with web application development using MVC/C# .net-Help with maintaining windows scheduled tasks-Optimize current Excel, Access database, Microsoft Project Server-based solution-Debug and solve problems with vb and vb.net applications-Maintain vb and vb.net legacy application-Help internal customers over the phone/IM/Email by debugging and fixing problems in our toolsGood to have:-Develop, update and maintain Excel, Access database, Microsoft Project Server-based solution-Willing to learn new technologies-Understanding of database-Python and AIBasic Requirements-Programming Language: C#, MVC, .net, VB/VB.net-Education: Bachelor's degree in STEM-US Citizenship requirement: No-More than 1 years of experience with C#, MVC, .net, VB/VB.net", "-candidates must be US Citizens or Permanent Residents-clearance is not required-manager is open to candidates over the rate card. please utilize the new submittals process for that-all hours will be paid at the straight time rate-could be contract to hire for the right candidate-Stem degree is NOT required, although it is preferred! education requirements are as follows: Bachelor's degree in the appropriate discipline and 5 years of relevant experience or an advanced degree in the appropriate discipline and 3 years of relevant experience. In the absence of a degree, HS Diploma/Equivalent plus 9 years of relevant experience is required-no travel is anticipated for this position"]

column4: ['Position objective: ', 'The Sr Software Developer works within product development teams and builds software solutions addressing the needs of the product. The work is performed in an agile fashion with sprints containing well-groomed stories and tasks. This position works closely with other team members both onshore and offshore.', '', 'ESSENTIAL JOB RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Typical work-related activities include (5 to 6 bullets maximum):', '\uf0b7 Develop UI Angular web applications', '\uf0b7 Develop UI React web applications', '\uf0b7 Ideally Full Stack Web Developer with Node.js or similar API expertise', '\uf0b7 Provides technical leadership on large-scale projects, offering guidance on issue resolution and technical strategies to achieve objectives', '\uf0b7 Oversees CI/CD pipeline processes for assigned products', '\uf0b7 Helps drive decisions on overall platform design', '', 'People Management Responsibilities:', '☐ Team Leader (leads team activities, either functional or cross-functional; no official people management', 'responsibilities.', '', 'MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS', 'EDUCATION:', '\uf0b7 Bachelor’s degree required, preferably in computer science, computer engineering or information technology', '\uf0b7 Or an equivalent combination of education and experience from which comparable knowledge and abilities can be acquired', '', 'EXPERIENCE:', '\uf0b7 A minimum of 7years of related experience that includes:', 'o Experience with AWS platforms and services including Lambda, RDS, Dynamo, ECS, Code Build and Code Pipeline is nice to have', 'o Expertise in Docker containers and Docker Compose', 'o Strong software development experience in Angular, React, Node', 'o Familiarity with Ruby, PHP, Python, or Java is a plus', 'o Expertise as scrum master in Jira', 'o Experience in API development and Swagger Hub', 'o Experience in GraphQL', 'o Experience leading the work of cross-functional teams', '\uf0b7 Experience with Stripe and PCI compliance', '\uf0b7 SQL and Postgres experience preferred', '', 'KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ABILITIES:', '\uf0b7 Excellent communications skills', '\uf0b7 Strong collaboration skills with ability to develop and maintain working relationships across teams', '\uf0b7 Ability to develop software project timelines', '\uf0b7 Ability to consider overall enterprise architectures', '\uf0b7 Understanding of Agile development methodology, preferably with SAFe', '\uf0b7 Strong decision-making, prioritization, problem solving and analytical skills', '\uf0b7 Ability to lead in a rapidly transforming organization', '\uf0b7 Highly autonomous and demonstrated ability to take initiate and ownership', 'Node, Graphql, Postgresql', "**********'W2 only, No C2C********************"]

SQL experience in writing complex queries. Previous involvement with enterprise wide, cross functional and complex projects that involve multiple business areas Knowledge of software development processes and understanding of technology, systems environments, and enterprise architecture Good to have skills* Insurance Domain - Annuity /Retirement /Pensions knowledge would be a an extra advantage. Knowledge on Python and should be able to understand the Python code Effective written and oral communication skills, including, facilitation and presentation skills Strong negotiation skills to explore alternatives and positions to reach outcomes that gain the support and acceptance of all parties. Key responsibilities* Understand business requirements, analyze data model, data structure, code and data flow to prepare mapping documents for ETL Work. Work with stakeholders to define and develop technical solutions. Ensure the correct stakeholders are actively participating and collaborate with Technology partners and stakeholders to clarify understanding of high-level business needs and requirements. Elicit, analyze, model, and document detailed requirements by using a variety of elicitation techniques, understanding business processes and technology solutions, and ensures strategic and project goals alignment. Validate requirements with stakeholders and the project team by communicating and presenting requirements artifacts, models, and deliverables appropriate to stakeholder needs. Manage requirements and facilitate requirements change decisions by using traceability tools and techniques, prioritization techniques, approval processes, and requirements change management processes. Adhere to software development lifecycle (SDLC), operational procedures, and project management methodologies by performing business systems analysis. Ensure work is in alignment with Wellmarks overall strategy and organizational goals, including business and technology roadmaps. Train, coach and mentor business systems and test analysts as needed. May assist and/or interface in testing functions as appropriate. Other duties as assigned.

column4:
['
 Our comprehensive, 12-week paid internship program gives you the opportunity to test your skills working for the nation’s leading producer of cleaner fuels and developer of renewable chemicals. This internship will begin May 17, 2021 and end August 7, 2021. REG values our interns. Our hopes are to host you in person, but with the potential of being remote like we committed to in the summer of 2020.\xa0

POSITION PURPOSE:\xa0
The purpose of this position is to assist with supporting business needs for reporting, data cleansing, and implementing a data analytics solution.\xa0


ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS: \xa0
\xa0
Key Accountabilities:
Support:

Respond to employee needs in person or via electronic communications to provide support for Tableau and data connections.
Gather requirements for bug fixes and changes requested via support system.


Data Cleansing:

Create business and technical requirements to pass off to a developer for implementation in the data warehouse.
Understand business processes in\xa0Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems and external systems to create documentation for data cleansing process.


Analytics

Using business requirements to create a statistical model.
Understand business data to create a usable dashboard in Tableau.
Assist in gathering requirements around departmental key performance indicators (KPIs) and design a dashboard or solution for managers to track and drive performance accordingly.



Other frequent duties:

Document test results.
Participate in user acceptance testing.
Report on project progress, risks, and issues.
Perform other duties as assigned.


JOB QUALIFICATIONS:
Education Required: Pursuing a degree in Information Technology, Business Analytics, Statistics, or related degree \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0\xa0
Experience Required:
Business environment experience, relevant courses, and internship preferred

Skills Required: \xa0
Knowledge of statistical modeling
Knowledge of relational databases and SQL
Knowledge of programming languages
Proficiency with Microsoft Office
Problem solving capabilities

Special skills or knowledge preferred:
Use of Tableau
Knowledge of business requirements process
Knowledge of integrating Tableau with Python or R


REG is committed to creating a diverse environment and is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, or veteran status. 
\xa0

Recommended skills
Data Analysis
Data Warehousing
Business Requirements
Data Cleansing
Business Analytics
Tableau (Busines Intelligence Software)

']

column4:
["
Role: \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Software Engineer

Location: \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Des Moines, IA \xa0



Duration: 12 months w/ extensions 



Required Documents to Submit: Work Auth, Photo ID, and Skype Details 



Quality Assurance: See Resume Expectations (Below) for genuine authenticity



Interview Mode: In-person or Zoom interviews, 



\xa0
Qualifications:




Hand-on Experience with IBM Application Server technologies (Traditional WebSphere, Portal, Java Batch, Liberty)\xa0
Development/Scripting background a plus - Java, C, C#, Python, PowerShell, Ansible\xa0
Basic knowledge of insurance and financial services products preferred.\xa0
Excellent planning, organizational, problem-solving, analytical, decision-making and communication skills required.\xa0
Excellent time management skills preferred.\xa0
Must be able to maintain a high degree of accuracy and confidentiality.\xa0
Must have the desire to learn new technology and continuously grow.\xa0
Ability to work on cross-functional teams and collaborate with both It and non-IT partners.\xa0
Will be required to provide on-call support.\xa0
Possess a high degree of integrity and actively cooperate and interact with all entities of the Principal Financial Group.\xa0




\xa0



Responsibilities:



Are you looking for a new role where there are exciting challenges with designing, implementing and supporting high volume, highly available systems infrastructure? If so, Application Platform Services - Application Hosting has the opportunity for you! You will be a part of a team that supports the infrastructure for application middleware that enables business areas to develop and deploy applications at Principal. We're looking for somebody with a strong technical aptitude who has the desire and ability to learn new technologies.\xa0



As a member of the team you will share responsibilities in:\xa0




Building, maintaining, monitoring, testing, documenting, analyzing, and providing technical support for application hosting infrastructure that consists of over 20 separate product solutions hosting over 1500 deployed applications both domestically and internationally.\xa0
Supporting technologies and solutions that are primarily based on Java and Java EE, including: Oracle WebLogic, IBM Liberty and IBM WebSphere Application Server (TWAS) and associated add-on products, including Java Batch and Portal.\xa0
Automating/orchestrating builds/maintenance/repeatable processes\xa0
Monitoring performance tuning and capacity planning to meet customer needs and SLA requirements.




\xa0



Manager's Notes:



\xa0



1. Why is this position open? This is an add (contract position) within the Application Platform Services space due to the ingestion of Wells Fargo workload (Principal purchased Wells retirement business).\xa0



\xa0



2. How is it impacting the business? High workload impacts our ability to deliver on both critical operational/Service Delivery and Feature-related work within the Web Hosting space.\xa0



\xa0



3. Could you please provide 3 - 4 sentences of the project work and what do day to day responsibilities look like? We utilize Agile/SAFe in the Application Platform Services (APS) space at Principal and will be utilizing the contractor to fulfill both Operational and Feature work on an ongoing basis. Program Increments (PIs) are slated over a 10 week period, with five “2 week sprints” comprising a PI. Day-to-day responsibilities include building/maintaining Application Hosting middleware components (IBM Liberty, IBM WebSphere, IBM Portal, Oracle WebLogic). The position includes regular on-call rotation, including nights and weekends.\xa0



\xa0



4. What technologies or systems will this contractor be utilizing?\xa0



• IBM WebSphere & add-on product sets\xa0



• Apache/Linux\xa0



• IIS/Windows\xa0



• Shell scripting\xa0



• Ansible\xa0



• Windows/Powershell Scripting\xa0



• Bit bucket\xa0



\xa0



5. What are your absolute “Must haves” in a candidate? Preferred/Desired?\xa0

Must Haves\xa0
\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 § Java Application Server/Runtime administration experience, preferably IBM WebSphere\xa0
\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 § OS Administration/Troubleshooting (#1 – Unix, #2 – Windows) \xa0\xa0\xa0 § Excellent communication skills § Strong debugging/troubleshooting skills (Log Analysis, System troubleshooting/debugging)\xa0
\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 § Ability work with customers and educate them on the proper solutions\xa0
\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 § Willingness to work as team not as an individual (team player) \xa0\xa0\xa0 § On-Call Availability\xa0




\xa0



Desired\xa0



\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 • Coding/Scripting/Development\xa0



\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 • Ansible/Orchestration\xa0



\xa0



6. Could you breakdown the responsibility composition for this role in terms of percentages?\xa0

Operations/Service Delivery – 50% /\xa0
Feature work including automation, orchestration, scripting, & development – 50%.\xa0

7. Size and Culture of their team? 7 member team (Application Hosting) under the same umbrella as another 6 person team (Web Hosting) to comprise the “Hosting” team within the Application Platform Services (APS) department.\xa0



\xa0
RESUME EXPECTATIONS
\xa0
RESUME: FAIR, ACCURATE & TRUTHFUL 




It is CRITICAL that candidates ONLY LIST their actual hands-on experience within their job detail 
It is CRITICAL to ONLY LIST accurate qualifications of experience on professional summary 




\xa0



WE GET IT: THERE ARE CHALLENGES\xa0 




We understand that in the market, the situation for visa candidates is dire in that getting the interview is very important; not getting the chance for an opportunity, means visa statuses can be put at risk 
We understand this pressure 




\xa0



OUR STRENGTHS: ACCOUNT RELATIONSHIPS\xa0 




Candidates don’t need the extra fluff, buzzwords, to get the interview
WE WILL get the interview based on our relationships
Extra buzzwords aren’t necessary 

\xa0
RISKING THE OPPORTUNITY: FAKE EXPERIENCE\xa0 




Listing experience that the candidate DOESN’T have is really one of the dumbest ways to screw up chances 
ESPECIALLY when it comes to the CORE SKILLS the manager is looking for 
This is because anything on the resume in the last 3 –4 project is fair game for technical vetting

If a candidate lists it, it will be explored 
And not with basic questions but with advanced questions that go deeper and deeper
These leads, architects and managers are very smart; this tactic WILL BE EXPOSED 





\xa0



WIN THE DEAL: HONEST, FAIR EXPECTATIONS\xa0 




The managers are forgiving if someone doesn’t have experience 

They want to see how smart a candidate is; they could be very strong in their core areas of expertise, but listing a strength that is inaccurate, the managers will they think they aren’t strong at all \xa0
They want to examine how a developer thinks, and what best brandishes their strengths & core competencies
They’ll assume that if that is the depth of core knowledge in area X, then in area Y, they will be able to develop that expertise with time and exposure

\xa0



Setting honest expectations DOES NOT LIMIT one’s chances - it improves one’s chances. 



\xa0



The managers are seeking depth of skill in areas the candidate has strong experience with. They are forgiving if someone doesn’t have experience with a technology. 



\xa0



But, if someone’s alleged ‘core strength’ is tested with APPLYING KNOWLEDGE (in person code), then they will assume the candidate is JUNIOR. The candidate may actually have incredible expertise IN A DIFFERENT AREA that the manager would appreciate, work with, and value. 



\xa0
The manager measures the candidate, by the expectations THE CANDIDATE sets. 



\xa0--



\xa0



Thanks & Regards



Ejaz Siddiqui | Business Development Executive



Email\xa0 : [ Link removed ] -  Click here to apply to Software Engineer
\xa0

Recommended skills
Administration
Analysis
Capacity Planning
Java Batch
Ibm Websphere Application Server
Oracle Web Logic Server

"]
column5: ['Administration', 'Analysis', 'Capacity Planning', 'Java Batch', 'Ibm Websphere Application Server', 'Oracle Web Logic Server']

['JOB DUTIES:

• Serve as IT Cloud Developer on the ISG Operations team, including handling on-call duties.

• Developing automation for cloud and on premise infrastructure.

• Troubleshooting production issues and communicating root cause of problems to others.

• Working with teams globally to support the ISG initiatives.

• Developing scripts to drive automation for Applications and Accounts.REQUIRED:*Excellent communicator, written and verbal.*Ability to work in a global team environment.*Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or a related discipline and/or equivalent work experience.*2+ years of experience with application development and scripting languages.*Strong attention to detail and problem solving skills.*Self-motivated and able to work independently.*Able to participate in on-call rotation every month and handle off-hours support work.*Ability to travel domestically 10% of the time or less. Travel will mainly be to the ADV Lab in Milan.* Experience with AWS (Amazon Web Services).PREFERRED:*2+ years of experience with AWS, Lambda.*1+ years of experience with Unix/Linux operating systems.*1+ years of experience with Elastic Search administration or support.*2+ years of experience with infrastructure as code, automation, troubleshooting and root cause analysis.*3+ years of experience with Python, Boto, or Perl scripting.*Experience with applications development environment, database, data administration and infrastructure capabilities and constraints.*Experience with Agile development processes including: Test Driven Development and Test Automation.', 'Note : Travel will mainly be to the ADV Lab in Milan, IL. Contingent will either ride along with a FTE, or drive a rental car. *24-hour on call rotation for one week approximately once a month', 'All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.']

["Important Note: During the application process, ensure your contact information (email and phone number) is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration. To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation. The invitation can be sent by both email and text message.\xa0 In order to receive text message invitations, your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as 'Personal Cell' or 'Cellular' in the contact information of your application.", "At Wells Fargo, we want to satisfy our customers' financial needs and help them succeed financially. We're looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do. Join our diverse and inclusive team where you'll feel valued and inspired to contribute your unique skills and experience.", 'Help us build a better Wells Fargo. It all begins with outstanding talent. It all begins with you.', 'Corporate Risk helps all Wells Fargo businesses identify and manage risk. The team focuses on several key risk types, including conduct, credit, financial crimes, information security, interest rate, liquidity, market, model, operational, regulatory compliance, reputation, strategic, and technology risk. The group provides leadership, enhances communications, assists with problem identification and solutions, and shares best practices. In addition, the group provides an enterprise-wide view of risk, assists management and our Board of Directors in identifying and monitoring risks that may affect multiple lines of business, and takes appropriate action when business activities exceed the risk tolerance of the company.', "Corporate Model Risk:\xa0 Wells Fargo's Corporate Model Risk is responsible for independently overseeing the management of model risk exposures across the enterprise (including governing, monitoring, and reporting on aggregate model risk exposures, model validations, and model oversight across enterprise). This oversight extends to all phases of a model's life cycle, including identification, development, validation, implementation, finding resolution, usage, performance monitoring, documentation, and retirement.", "Qualitative Model Validation:\xa0 The Qualitative Model Validation group is responsible for validating and approving all qualitative models used across Wells Fargo including Credit, Liquidity, Market, Operational, Pre-Provision Net Revenue (PPNR), Finance, Balance Sheet, and Financial Crimes to name a few. The team's responsibilities include performing model validations (independent reviews, writing validation reports, and approving model usage), annual reviews, performance monitoring, and issue management. The team works closely with model users, developers, model governance, and Corporate Functional Model Oversight (CFMO) teams to manage model risk to the firm and facilitate the model approval process.", 'The Role: The Qualitative Model Validator will be responsible for the quality and completion of model validation to support business activities across several areas. This role will cover models in the following areas, among others: securities valuation, investment and portfolio management, market & counterparty risk, stress testing, and financial planning & analysis.', 'Specifically this individual will have responsibility to:', 'The Candidate: This validator will have substantial experience in his/her area of specialty to facilitate credible challenge of the processes/models and to develop the skills of the junior validation team.', '', '', 'AZ-PHX-Central Phoenix: 100 W Washington St - Phoenix, AZIA-West Des Moines: 7001 Westown Pkwy - West Des Moines, IANY-New York: 150 E 42nd St - New York, NYMN-Minneapolis: 600 S 4th St - Minneapolis, MNTX-DAL-Downtown Dallas: 1445 Ross Ave - Dallas, TXNC-Charlotte: 301 S Tryon St - Charlotte, NCMO-Saint Louis: 1 N Jefferson Ave - Saint Louis, MO', 'All offers for employment with Wells Fargo are contingent upon the candidate having successfully completed a criminal background check. Wells Fargo will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable local, state and Federal law, including Section 19 of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act.Relevant military experience is considered for veterans and transitioning service men and women.Wells Fargo is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer, Minority/Female/Disabled/Veteran/Gender Identity/Sexual Orientation.']

["

Genesis10 is actively seeking a Sr. BI/ETL Database Developer\xa0resource\xa0for a direct hire/permanent position opening with our transportation industry client located in Overland Park, KS.\xa0\xa0\xa0Description:This resource develops, maintain, supports data initiatives and contributes to enterprise architecture across ETL, BI, Database, Data Warehouse environments.\xa0 Provides guidance to developers concerning design and data access requirements.\xa0 Works with systems administration on hardware and operating system level requirements in support of the deployed data software.\xa0 Leads and participates in large cross-enterprise projects requiring strong analysis, design, and leadership skills.\xa0 Serves as a subject-matter expert and may act as a team lead for a team of Data Engineers or similar roles.\xa0 Documents, communicates, and executes solution recommendations with limited guidance from the supervisor.\xa0 Collaborates with the rest of the Data Services team to learn the aspects of the business and develop analytic insight. Creates and maintains standards and detailed procedures concerning data development. Researches new efficiencies and technologies.
Responsibilities :
 Creates and maintains database tables, indexes, database utilities and supporting jobs. Safeguards the security and integrity of the database environment. Assists in performance monitoring and tuning of both application access and database management. Participates in volume, benchmarking, and stress testing of data access. Troubleshoots, analyzes and reviews application, architecture and vendor software failures and resolves requests, complex problems and outages in a timely and effective manner utilizing assistance from vendors and in-house resources.\xa0 Responds appropriately to customer impact problems – understands business impact.\xa0 Identifies and documents root cause and symptoms of problem, develops schedules and implements permanent corrective actions. Leads technical forums to facilitate knowledge sharing among technical resources.\xa0 Handles vendor related issues concerning the support, implementation, upgrade and impact analysis, evaluation and selection of third-party products. Provides input into department planning, budgeting, project estimates and project management. Analyzes, interprets, and translates all internal client business requirements into specific technical requirements. Works to optimize technology. Continually attempts to improve performance and efficiency. Researches emerging technologies and analyzes the benefits of adopting those technologies.

Competencies : Adaptability - Maintaining effectiveness when experiencing major changes in work responsibilities or environment (e.g., people, processes, structure, or culture); adjusting effectively to change by exploring the benefits, trying new approaches, and collaborating with others to make the change successful. Building Trusting Relationships - Using appropriate interpersonal styles to establish effective relationships with customers and internal partners; interacting with others in a way that promotes openness and trust and gives them confidence in one's intentions. Collaborating - Working cooperatively with others to help a team or work group achieve its goals. Communication - Conveying information and ideas clearly and concisely to individuals or groups in an engaging manner that help them understand and retain the message; listening actively to others. Continuous Learning - Actively identifying new areas for learning; regularly creating and taking advantage of learning opportunities; using newly gained knowledge and skill on the job and learning through their application. Initiating Action - Taking prompt action to accomplish work goals; taking action to achieve results beyond what is required; being proactive. Work Standards - Setting high standards of performance for self and others; assuming responsibility and accountability for successfully completing assignments or tasks; self-imposing standards of excellence rather than having standards imposed.

Requirements:\xa0
 Bachelor's degree specializing in computer science or equivalent work experience required. 7+ years of experience with data warehouse technical architectures, ETL/ ELT, reporting/analytic tools. Strong background with scripting to drive automation. Sound knowledge of traditional as well as agile software development methodologies. Ability to apply Database Design Principles (OLTP). Solve complex technical problems and mentor/support other technical staff on data modeling and ETL related issues. Ensure that data designs follow architectural best practices and appropriate business rules and data structures are designed for flexibility to support future business needs. Implement best practices, version control and deployment strategies to ensure product quality, agility, and recoverability. Translate Business requirements into Data Requirements. Understand the data elements and their domains; understand relationships among those elements and interdependencies between models. Strong ability to carry out research and innovation. Develop Logical Data Models, Physical Data Models, and Data Element Dictionaries. Develop and implement SQL scripts, Stored Procedures and ETL processes SQL-based and NoSQL-based technologies. Data warehousing solutions Detailed design and build of the enterprise data warehouse and data marts from inception through production support. Develop a quality framework to ensure delivery of high-quality data and analyses to stakeholders Be an advocate for best practices while balancing business value and reasonable practicality Highly effective working in a team as well as working independently.

Preferred Qualifications:\xa0 Strong SQL Server and Oracle experience. Experience with Oracle/SQL replication implementation Strong Microsoft Power BI experience. Experience with Service Broker. Experience with Data Warehousing, Data Lake and Data Marts Experience with cloud architecture and data repositories. Experience with AWS services including S3, Data-pipeline and other big data technologies. Experience with one or more scripting language(s) such as PowerShell or Python. Knowledge of Git or TFS as well as common branching strategies and workflows. Expert knowledge on various Data modeling techniques: OLTP (normalized), ODS, EDW (dimensional). Data modeling tools (e.g. UML, ERWin, Enterprise Architect and Visio). Knowledge of Industry Data Models. Experience with SSAS (Tabular and Multidimensional). Working knowledge in the creation of data infrastructure - such as views, stored procedures, ETL usage, real-time/streaming data integration. Knowledge in developing data models compliant with non-functional enterprise requirements, such as security and performance guidelines. Deep understanding of data flow diagrams, system architecture diagrams, functional and system analysis. Understanding and hands-on experience of the Data Architecture, Data Quality, and Data Profiling concepts. Problem solving attitude, eagerness to learn new tools and technologies, and a proactive approach to daily activities. Good oral and written communication skills. Strong initiative and organization skills. Demonstrated experience in project management.

If you have the described qualifications and are interested in this exciting opportunity, apply today!About Genesis10:Genesis10 is a Professional Technology Services Firm providing Staffing, Workforce Optimization and Domestic Outsourcing Solutions. If you are a high performing business or IT professional with solid, referenced experience, we want to meet you. Genesis10 recruiters and delivery professionals are highly accomplished career advocates, who get to know you beyond your resume to position you with the opportunities that fit your skills, experience and aspirations. We have benefit options to fit your needs and a support staff that works with you from placement throughout your engagement – project after project. To learn more about Genesis10 and to view all our available career opportunities, please visit us at [ Link removed ] -  Click here to apply to Sr BI/ETL Database Developer

\xa0

Recommended skills
Data Modeling
Data Architecture
Extract Transform Load (Etl)
Data Warehousing
Database Design
Data Profiling

"]
